target.name: war
target.echo:
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ sonar.war is ready to be deployed. It is linked by default to the Sonar home directory: ${sonarHome} Each machine on which the sonar.war archive is going to be deployed should have locally this Sonar home directory. This directory is used by Sonar for instance to store Sonar plugins. This is possible to override this default Sonar home directory by defining the SONAR_HOME environment variable
IMPORTANT NOTES : * Supported web servers are Jetty and Tomcat 5.x/6.x/7.x * The war file must be rebuilt in case of sonar upgrade ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
